page.title: 09The Carnival & other Events.
page.content: { Oxted Carnival}is held every June. Floats are driven around town & then judged on{Master Park.}Each year there is a theme -- this year it is "Space & the Future". Side-shows & stalls cont- inue for about{6}hours.{Funfairs}visit Oxted twice a year, with big-wheels, bumper-cars, roundabouts, arcade-games etc. Churches, Schools, Scouts, Hospital and other organisations hold annual fund-raising Events:-- Fetes , Fairs, Donkey Derby, Sponsored Walks & Jumble Sales.{Annual Celebrations}inc- lude{Christmas (Dec.25th)}when we give presents & cards to each other to celebrate Jesus Christ's Birthday. We have lots of parties, with plenty of food & fun.{Santa Claus}is supposed to come down the chimney with toys to give to children.{ Easter}(MAR/APR) is when we remember Jesus' Death on the Cross. We give chocolate Easter Eggs.
